name: rps-battle
description: RPS Battle - Strategic Rock Paper Scissors Board Game

scripts.dev: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:client
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@rps/shared && npm run build --workspace=@rps/client && npm run build --workspace=@rps/server
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit --workspace=@rps/server && npm run test --workspace=@rps/shared
